problems.title: Dark Web Threat Intelligence Extraction
problems.description: Cybercriminals use the dark web to plan attacks, trade stolen data, and share malware. Security teams often struggle to track these discussions due to unstructured, multilingual, and constantly shifting platforms. There is a need for an intelligent system that can automatically scan, analyze, and extract meaningful threat intelligence from dark web sources, helping organizations identify risks early and strengthen cybersecurity defenses.

problems.title: AI-driven Referee Bias & Decision Pattern Detector
problems.description: In competitive sports, referee decisions play a crucial role, but human judgment is often prone to unconscious bias or inconsistency. This can lead to unfair advantages, disputes, and reduced trust in tournaments. There is a need for an AI-powered solution that can analyze referee decisions, commentary, and historical match data to identify bias patterns, ensuring greater transparency, accountability, and fairness in sports officiating.

problems.title: AI-driven Ball-by-Ball Commentary Summarizer
problems.description: Sports fans and analysts often find ball-by-ball commentary lengthy and difficult to follow in real time. Manual summarization is inconsistent and time-consuming, reducing the accessibility of key match highlights. An intelligent system is required that can automatically process live cricket commentary and generate concise summaries, key turning points, and performance stats, making match insights more engaging and accessible.

problems.title: AI-powered Bail Decision Support System
problems.description: Judicial systems face challenges in handling the high volume of bail applications, often leading to delays and inconsistencies. Judges must consider FIRs, chargesheets, and legal precedents while ensuring fairness and avoiding bias. There is a need for a decision support system that can analyze case data and past rulings to provide evidence-based bail recommendations, improving efficiency, transparency, and justice delivery.

problems.title: AI-driven Legal Precedent Finder
problems.description: Lawyers and judges frequently rely on past judgments to strengthen legal arguments and ensure fair rulings. However, manually searching through large volumes of case laws across jurisdictions is time-consuming and error-prone. An intelligent legal research assistant is required that can analyze ongoing cases and automatically retrieve the most relevant precedents, improving efficiency and ensuring consistency in judicial decisions.

problems.title: Multilingual Financial Fraud Detection from Unstructured Data
problems.description: Banks and financial institutions receive millions of loan applications, customer complaints, and support calls in multiple languages. Detecting fraud signals hidden in this unstructured data is a major challenge, leading to delayed action and financial losses. A multilingual AI-powered system is required that can process transcripts and documents in real time to flag fraudulent activities, enhancing security and customer trust.

problems.title: AI-driven Insider Trading Detection via News & Social Media
problems.description: Stock markets are heavily influenced by external information, and insider trading often leaves subtle traces across news, press releases, and social media chatter. Detecting such patterns manually is nearly impossible. An AI-based system is needed that can correlate sudden stock price movements with real-world events and online discussions, helping regulators and investors identify suspicious activity and maintain market integrity.

problems.title: Emergency Situation Summarizer from Helpline Transcripts
problems.description: During disasters such as floods or earthquakes, helplines receive thousands of calls with urgent needs. Authorities often struggle to process this overwhelming volume of information, delaying rescue and relief efforts. There is a need for an intelligent system that can automatically analyze helpline transcripts, summarize emergencies, and highlight critical needs like location and urgency, enabling faster and more effective disaster response.

problems.title: AI-driven Crop Advisory from Farmer Helpline Calls
problems.description: Farmers often seek support through helpline calls to address problems such as pests, soil health, or irrigation. However, the vast number of calls makes it difficult to respond quickly and provide personalized advice. An AI-powered solution is required that can analyze helpline audio, classify issues, and deliver context-aware recommendations, empowering farmers with timely and actionable guidance.

problems.title: Agricultural Disease Detection via Multimodal NLP
problems.description: Plant diseases pose a serious threat to agriculture, and farmers often struggle to describe symptoms accurately. Current systems fail to combine different modes of input, such as spoken complaints, written text, and visual images of crops. There is a need for a multimodal AI solution that can understand farmer queries and correlate them with plant disease databases, providing accurate diagnoses and preventive measures.
